name: ng2-activiti-processlist-demo
description: Show available processes from the Activiti BPM suite - Demo
author: Will Abson

scripts.clean: npm install rimraf && rimraf dist node_modules typings dist
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run server"
scripts.build: npm run tslint && rimraf dist && tsc
scripts.build:w: npm run tslint && rimraf dist && tsc -w
